# @babel/helper-annotate-as-pure

> Helper function to annotate paths and nodes with #__PURE__ comment

## Install

Using npm:

```sh
npm install --save-dev @babel/helper-annotate-as-pure
```

or using yarn:

```sh
yarn add @babel/helper-annotate-as-pure --dev
```
